CommandDefinition.Name: buildapplicationxml
CommandDefinition.Description: Build application.xml for a given application definition.

Argument.Name: versionName
Argument.Description: The name of the version. Default: 'workingset'

Argument.Name: fileName
Argument.Description: The name of the resulting XML file. Default: 'application.xml'

BoolOption.Name: cs
BoolOption.Description: Create an application.xml for the stub version of the application
